verses.verse: The word<WH1697> that came to Jeremiah<WH3414> from the LORD<WH3068>, saying<WH559>,

¶ Behold, ye trust<WH982> in lying<WH8267> words<WH1697>, that cannot profit<WH3276>.

Will ye steal<WH1589>, murder<WH7523>, and commit adultery<WH5003>, and swear<WH7650> falsely<WH8267>, and burn incense<WH6999> unto Baal<WH1168>, and walk<WH1980> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> whom ye know<WH3045> not;

And come<WH935> and stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> me in this house<WH1004>, which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>, and say<WH559>, We are delivered<WH5337> to do<WH6213> all these abominations<WH8441>?
Is this house<WH1004>, which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>, become a den<WH4631> of robbers<WH6530> in your eyes<WH5869>? Behold, even I have seen<WH7200> it, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>.

And now, because ye have done<WH6213> all these works<WH4639>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>, and I spake<WH1696> unto you, rising up early<WH7925> and speaking<WH1696>, but ye heard<WH8085> not; and I called<WH7121> you, but ye answered<WH6030> not;

And I will cast you out<WH7993> of my sight<WH6440>, as I have cast out<WH7993> all your brethren<WH251>, even the whole seed<WH2233> of Ephraim<WH669>.

Therefore pray<WH6419> not thou for this people<WH5971>, neither lift up<WH5375> cry<WH7440> nor prayer<WH8605> for them<WH1157>, neither make intercession<WH6293> to me: for I will not hear<WH8085> thee.
¶ Seest<WH7200> thou not what they do<WH6213> in the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389>?

The children<WH1121> gather<WH3950> wood<WH6086>, and the fathers<WH1> kindle<WH1197> the fire<WH784>, and the women<WH802> knead<WH3888> their dough<WH1217>, to make<WH6213> cakes<WH3561> to the queen<WH4446> of heaven<WH8064>, and to pour out<WH5258> drink offerings<WH5262> unto other<WH312> gods<WH430>, that they may provoke me to anger<WH3707>.
Do they provoke me to anger<WH3707>? saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>: do they not provoke themselves to the confusion<WH1322> of their own faces<WH6440>?

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, mine anger<WH639> and my fury<WH2534> shall be poured out<WH5413> upon this place<WH4725>, upon man<WH120>, and upon beast<WH929>, and upon the trees<WH6086> of the field<WH7704>, and upon the fruit<WH6529> of the ground<WH127>; and it shall burn<WH1197>, and shall not be quenched<WH3518>.
¶ Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Put<WH5595> your burnt offerings<WH5930> unto your sacrifices<WH2077>, and eat<WH398> flesh<WH1320>.

For I spake<WH1696> not unto your fathers<WH1>, nor commanded<WH6680> them in the day<WH3117> that I brought them out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, concerning<WH1697> burnt offerings<WH5930> or sacrifices<WH2077>:

But they hearkened<WH8085> not, nor inclined<WH5186> their ear<WH241>, but walked<WH3212> in the counsels<WH4156> and in the imagination<WH8307> of their evil<WH7451> heart<WH3820>, and went backward<WH268>, and not forward<WH6440>.

Since the day<WH3117> that your fathers<WH1> came forth out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> unto this day<WH3117> I have even sent<WH7971> unto you all my servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030>, daily<WH3117> rising up early<WH7925> and sending<WH7971> them:
Yet they hearkened<WH8085> not unto me, nor inclined<WH5186> their ear<WH241>, but hardened<WH7185> their neck<WH6203>: they did worse<WH7489> than their fathers<WH1>.
Therefore thou shalt speak<WH1696> all these words<WH1697> unto them; but they will not hearken<WH8085> to thee: thou shalt also call<WH7121> unto them; but they will not answer<WH6030> thee.

But thou shalt say<WH559> unto them, This is a nation<WH1471> that obeyeth<WH8085> not the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> their God<WH430>, nor receiveth<WH3947> correction<WH4148>: truth<WH530> is perished<WH6>, and is cut off<WH3772> from their mouth<WH6310>.

¶ Cut off<WH1494> thine hair<WH5145>, O Jerusalem, and cast it away<WH7993>, and take up<WH5375> a lamentation<WH7015> on high places<WH8205>; for the LORD<WH3068> hath rejected<WH3988> and forsaken<WH5203> the generation<WH1755> of his wrath<WH5678>.

For the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> have done<WH6213> evil<WH7451> in my sight<WH5869>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>: they have set<WH7760> their abominations<WH8251> in the house<WH1004> which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>, to pollute<WH2930> it.

And they have built<WH1129> the high places<WH1116> of Tophet<WH8612>, which is in the valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom<WH2011>, to burn<WH8313> their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323> in the fire<WH784>; which I commanded<WH6680> them not, neither came<WH5927> it into my heart<WH3820>.

¶ Therefore, behold, the days<WH3117> come<WH935>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>, that it shall no more be called<WH559> Tophet<WH8612>, nor the valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom<WH2011>, but the valley<WH1516> of slaughter<WH2028>: for they shall bury<WH6912> in Tophet<WH8612>, till there be no<WH369> place<WH4725>.

And the carcases<WH5038> of this people<WH5971> shall be meat<WH3978> for the fowls<WH5775> of the heaven<WH8064>, and for the beasts<WH929> of the earth<WH776>; and none shall fray them away<WH2729>.
